meanings.definition: Incorrect or improper uses of something
meanings.sent1: The misusages of the tools led to accidents in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: She learned from her misusages and became more careful with her belongings.
meanings.sent3: The misusages of the office printer made everyone laugh at the funny results.
meanings.sent4: His misusages of time turned his life into a chaotic mess.
meanings.sent5: The misusages of language in the play made the audience gasp in surprise.

meanings.definition: Instances of using something in a wrong or inappropriate way
meanings.sent1: The misusages of company funds resulted in a financial investigation.
meanings.sent2: The misusages of power by the dictator caused unrest among the citizens.
meanings.sent3: The misusages of the new technology puzzled the older generation.
meanings.sent4: Her misusages of trust shattered relationships beyond repair.
meanings.sent5: The misusages of the rules created chaos in the classroom.
